query:
SELECT 
  e.name as employeeName,
  (SELECT SUM(er.total) FROM employeeRevenues er 
   JOIN dailyRevenues dr ON er.dailyRevenueId = dr.id 
   WHERE er.employeeId = e.id AND dr.date >= '2026-01-01' AND dr.date <= '2026-01-07') as actualRevenue,
  bd.weeklyRevenue as storedRevenue,
  bd.bonusAmount
FROM bonusDetails bd
JOIN employees e ON bd.employeeId = e.id
JOIN weeklyBonuses wb ON bd.weeklyBonusId = wb.id
WHERE wb.year = 2026 AND wb.month = 1 AND wb.weekNumber = 1 AND wb.branchId = 1
ORDER BY e.name;

  (SELECT SUM(er.total) FROM employeeRevenues er 
   JOIN dailyRevenues dr ON er.dailyRevenueId = dr.id 
   WHERE er.employeeId = e.id AND dr.date >= '2026-01-01' AND dr.date <= '2026-01-07') as actualRevenue,
  bd.weeklyRevenue as storedRevenue,
  bd.bonusAmount
FROM bonusDetails bd
JOIN employees e ON bd.employeeId = e.id
JOIN weeklyBonuses wb ON bd.weeklyBonusId = wb.id
WHERE wb.year = 2026 AND wb.month = 1 AND wb.weekNumber = 1 AND wb.branchId = 1
ORDER BY e.name;
